Posts.Content: BeanCounter42 wrote: I'm 43 and newly diagnosed (June 2011) with Stage IV breast cancer. I would like to connect with other women in a similar situation who live in the Charlotte, NC area. Kim Dx 6/10/2011, DCIS, 4cm, Stage IV, Grade 2, 8/14 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
